cleaned_text: Additional vaccines for people with a severely weakened immune system If you develop a new health condition or start treatment that severely weakens your immune system, you may need additional protection before autumn 2023. How to get an additional vaccine Your specialist will assess whether you need an additional vaccine. They will make a referral and advise on the best timing for vaccination around your planned treatment. Speak to your specialist for more information. Who should I contact if I have a severely weakened immune system and am struggling to access a COVID-19 vaccine in Norfolk and Waveney? Please contact NHS Norfolk and Waveney Integrated Care Board (ICB) Complaints and Enquiries Team. Call [01603 595857](tel:01603%20595857) Email [nwicb.contactus@nhs.net](mailto:nwicb.contactus@nhs.net) Norwich Norfolk Postcode NR1 2DH Where can I find out more information? More information is available in UK Health Security Agency's (UKHSA) [Green Book](https://gbr01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.publishing.service.gov.uk%2Fgovernment%2Fuploads%2Fsystem%2Fuploads%2Fattachment_data%2Ffile%2F1153300%2FGreenbook-chapter-14a-26April2023.pdf&data=05%7C01%7Calice.coleman9%40nhs.net%7Cdf345d6f541343f1bb5808db8e7457ec%7C37c354b285b047f5b22207b48d774ee3%7C0%7C0%7C638260402556274714%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=bQ%2FlkYQmONreeJrdUSaCzoxjJWluzUDmkz0K12AQ4dE%3D&reserved=0) which includes information on COVID-19 vaccines, the dosage and schedule for the UK and recommendations for the use of the vaccine.
